overview: The film tells about the past, present and future of the oldest university in the Urals – Perm University, which celebrated the centenary of its foundation in October 2016, about its importance as the most important center of science and culture for the region and for the whole country and as a place of intersection of human destinies. The film is based on the memories and reflections of graduates of different years about their ageless alma mater…
title: Towards the Future…
